summary: The Monarch Action, Recovery, and Conservation of Habitat Act of 2025 (MONARCH Act) aims to conserve and sustain the western monarch butterfly population. The bill establishes the Western Monarch Butterfly Rescue Fund and provides grants for projects focusing on habitat protection, restoration, and management. It mandates the Secretary of the Interior to facilitate updating and implementing the Western Monarch Butterfly Conservation Plan. The bill includes annual reporting to Congress on the status of the butterflies and funded projects. Appropriations are authorized for both the Fund and the Conservation Plan's implementation.
